summary: This modification overhaul Skyrim with much better quality textures. Idea is to drastically increase graphic quality and to preserve original look as much as possible.
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=4]This modification overhaul Skyrim with much better quality textures. Idea is to drastically increase graphic quality and to preserve original look as much as possible.[/size][/b]


[b] [size=5] Skyrim: Realistic Overhaul v1_1 [/size] [/b]
===================================================

[b][size=4]Features:[/size][/b]

- SRO 1_1 version contain previous Landscape textures. Some are new, but mostly normal maps are improved. They reflect lighting properly now.
- New feature are Cities, Temples, Dungeons, Villages textures.

[b]- Architecture:[/b]

- Markarth
- Riften
- Solitude
- Whiterun
- Windhelm
- Winterhold
- Skyhaventemple
- Sovngarde
- Highhrothgar

[b]- Dungeons:[/b]

- Caves
- Dwemer Ruins
- Imperial
- Nordic
- Riften

[b]- Furniture:[/b]

- Tables, barrels, bed, dressers, wood, crates, smelter, noble, nordic furniture...

- Villages are also improved. 
- Dawnguard is re-textured now. 

- Texture resolution is mostly 2048k. 
- My original plan was to put this pack in to separated bsa files. But because of size it was not an option. 
- Mod is packed in to 3 parts. Unpacked is over 4gb large.
- 1500 textures is replaced.

=========================================================================================================

[b][size=4]Recommendation:[/size][/b]

- For additional interior, furniture, food, cloth, armor... textures i recommend official Bethesda HD DLC.

- Also i recommend \"No stretching\" mod to be used along with SRO. It correct meshes so that textures will be less stretched: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26126

=========================================================================

[b][size=4]System Requirements:[/size][/b]

- Textures are much larger in this mod so you should have at least 4gb of RAM, and 64-bit OS.
- Your graphic card should have minimum 1gb of VRAM. More is recommended especially if you want 4096k mountains.
- There is Lite version available for people with low-end PCs. 

=====================================================================================

[b][size=4]Installation:[/size][/b]

- Extract \"textures\" folder from all 3 parts to Skyrim Data folder.
=============================================




[b][size=4]Updates:[/size][/b]

Changelog:
==========

v1.6:

- New caves, mines, imperial, nordic dungeons.

- New dwemer-ruins floor.

- New tent textures.

- New Whiterun, Solitude, Markarth, Highhrothgar stone-floor textures.

- Improved ruins clutter furniture.

- Improved some landscape textures.
==============================

v1.5:

- Fixed bar-set texture.

- Added ruins furnitures.

- I have forget to include this in 1.4 version.
===================================================

v1.4:

- New tables, barrels, bed, dressers, wood, crates, smelter, noble, nordic furniture...

- Improved statue textures.

- New landscape: ground-rock, tree-cut, ice-floes, and dirt-leafs textures.
=====================================================================

v1.3:

- Added some missing normal maps; Windhelm ice ground.

- New landscape snow stone and moss stone textures. 

- New Glacier textures.

- New tree snow bark textures.
==================================


v1.2:

- Fixed some normal maps.

- New bridge, road, trees, wood textures.
==================================
author: Starac
